full-title: Dream hotel in Langkawi | Travel Blog
google-description: Discover this hotel located on a small private island in Langkawi. Relax, enjoy the sun and the hot sand while sipping cocktails. When to go? How long? What budget to plan? We respond to you based on our own experience.
social-network-description: Located in the north of Malaysia, Langkawi is an archipelago of 99 islands. An ideal destination for a dream vacation. Hiking in the jungle or national parks but above all lazing on idyllic beaches to enjoy the sun and the hot sand while sipping a cocktail.
quote: Located in the north of Malaysia, Langkawi is an archipelago of 99 islands. An ideal destination for a dream vacation. Hiking in the jungle or national parks but above all lazing on idyllic beaches to enjoy the sun and the hot sand while sipping a cocktail.
